ComicInfo.Summary:
Glorian and the Shaper of Worlds bestow a gift upon Hulk- a perfect, paradisiac world! Betty confronts the tragic reality that her husband Glenn is brain-dead.
*Notes* Features the Hostess Twinkies ad, Captain Marvel In The Big Bang!! A one-page comic book advertisement starring G. I. Joe and Atomic Man was published in this issue.

ComicInfo.Title: The Man Who Came Down On a Rainbow!
